author: Huawei
description:
In the digital economy era, smart retail isn't an option. It's now a mandate. Thailand’s retail leader, CP AXTRA, is building intelligent stores and driving a full-chain digital and intelligent transformation that's powered by #Huawei solutions, driving efficiency, insight, and innovation across its retail chain.

This evolution is enhancing efficiency, optimizing operations, and lighting up the future of retail in Thailand.

Huawei’s Smart Retail solutions combine AI, cloud, and connectivity to empower retailers with real-time data, seamless experiences, and intelligent decision-making. Together, we’re lighting up the future of retail.
Learn more: http://bit.ly/4qmZJaX
title: Digital Evolution: CP AXTRA’s Smart Retail Transformation with Huawei
